name: Punchless (DEMO)
description:
This game is a demo and is still in development. This means it may be very buggy and have a lack of content. Any feedback in the comments would be appreciated. 

In this game, you play as a military soldier named Jeremy.

Jeremy has been captured. He woke up in what seemed to be the enemy's base, stripped of all his weapons and armour. His only choice of escape is to utilise his exeptional acrobatic skills to fight (or run) his way out. 

Take on armed enemies by weaving through bullets and using the environment to your advantage. Slam doors, push boxes and more to make your way through many varying levels.
